ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: OK Lunarpine was confused, why would she need a DNA scan from him? The reason wasn t important to him, he trusted her more than anybot around here. I ll

"OK" Lunarpine was confused, why would she need a DNA scan from him? 
The reason wasn't important to him, he trusted her more than anybot 
around here. "I'll give you the scan, but I'm not a mechanic, I'd 
cross the wrong wires and probably remodel this place halfway around 
this world. It'd take eons to pick up the pieces. You'll need to find 
one of the techbots for that."

He figured that she'd be disapointed for whatever reason she needed 
the hookup. he transformed back to his wolf form for the scans. 

(Just a thought, if the scanners could replicate transformed DNA then 
in the show Air Razor wouldn't have had to wait for a compatible 
lifeform, it would have used Rhinox or Cheetor so ask someone else if 
this moves legal first.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> "I know will sound strange, but I need to scna you while in beast 
> mode.  Just trust me. If this works, things will look a lot 
brighter 
> around here." She smiled a huge smile. "And then I'll need you help 
> me hook this thing up to a CR chamber."  She was having trouble 
> standing still, she was just too excited about this.  she prayed to 
> the Matrix that this would work.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine stood up and transformed back to his bot mode. "I'll 
help 
> > if I can, what's the project and what do I have to do?"
> > 
> > He stepped toward Shadow Wing it was nice to see that somebody 
> > appreciated his abilities.
> >
